SEARCH

Package GamePackage

package GamePackage
This package contains all main back-end classes that are used in the game.
  • Class
    Description
    Game
    This program implements a simple game, where short stories are displayed and after that, the player answers simple questions.
    NewGameException
    This is an exception to be thrown when a new game should be created
    Plan
    This class is used to work with a plan of a trip around Hogwarts.
    Player
    This class stores the player's features, their plan, interests, points and rewards.
    Questions
    This class handles the quiz after the stories are finished.
    Stats
    This class handles the stats of the game.
    TheEnd
    This class handles the ending GUI.
    Waiter
    This class implements a method to wait for a variable to become non-null.
